titles.title: Speak Lord In The Stillness (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Speak Lord in the stillness While I wait on Thee Hush'd my heart to listen In expectancy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Speak O blessed Master In this quiet hour Let me see Thy face Lord Feel Thy touch of power{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For the words Thou speakest They are life indeed Living bread from heaven Now my spirit feed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All to Thee is yielded I am not my own Blissful glad surrender I am Thine alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Speak Thy servant heareth Be not silent Lord Waits my soul upon Thee For the quickening word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fill me with the knowledge Of Thy glorious will All Thine own good pleasure In Thy child fulfill{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Like a watered garden Full of fragrance rare Ling'ring in Thy presence Let my life appear{/lang-eng}
